file.name: issue-454.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
servers:
  - url: /v1
info:
  description: This is a simple API
  version: 1.0.0
  title: Simple Inventory API
  contact:
    email: you@your-company.com
  license:
    name: Apache 2.0
    url: 'http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0.html'
tags:
  - name: admins
    description: Secured Admin-only calls
  - name: developers
    description: Operations available to regular developers
paths:
  /inventory:
    get:
      summary: searches inventory test
      operationId: searchInventory
      responses:
        '200':
          description: search results matching criteria
        default:
          $ref: 'https://remote-components.com/issue-454-components#/components/responses/GeneralError'
components:
  schemas:
    ModelWithNestedProperties:
      properties:
        remoteProperty:
          $ref: 'https://remote-components.com/issue-454-components#/components/schemas/RemoteComponent'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: at 1:15: schemas: "ModelWithNestedProperties": parse schema: property "remoteProperty": at 1:87: parse schema: resolve "https://remote-components.com/issue-454-components#/components/schemas/RemoteComponent": external "https://remote-components.com/issue-454-components": get: https: do: Get "https://remote-components.com/issue-454-components": host "remote-components.com" is not allowed
